What People Commonly Do After a Slip and Fall Accident

Slip and fall accidents often occur on public or private property. This guide provides general, educational information about steps people commonly research after such incidents.

Advertising

Immediate Actions

  • Seeking medical evaluation
  • Documenting the hazard and location
  • Reporting the incident to property management

Related guides: Evidence Checklist · When to Call an Attorney

No medical advice. Nothing on this page is medical advice. Seek care from a licensed clinician for medical concerns.
